programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.sub-title: The Island with Bear Grylls - The Women: Episode 2
programme.desc: In the ultimate survival experiment, Bear Grylls has abandoned 14 British women on a remote desert island in the pacific with just the clothes they stand up in and a few basic tools. This time the survival challenge is harder than before, as they attempt to survive entirely on their own wits for six weeks in the height of the tropical storm season. The women are desperately dehydrated and separated, after an expedition party crossed the island to find a permanent camp - and got hopelessly lost while returning to the others.

programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.sub-title: The Island with Bear Grylls - The Men: Episode 3
programme.desc: In the ultimate survival experiment, Bear Grylls has abandoned 14 British men on a remote desert island in the Pacific with just the clothes they stand up in and a few basic tools. This time the survival challenge is harder than ever before, as they attempt to survive entirely on their own wits for six weeks in the height of the tropical storm season. In this episode the men face a life and death struggle with the island's most fearsome predator.

programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.sub-title: The Island with Bear Grylls - The Women: Episode 3
programme.desc: It’s Lauren’s 25th birthday but there’s little to celebrate. Two castaways have already abandoned the women’s island due to the extreme conditions, since being dropped in the Pacific seven days ago. The 12 remaining are desperately dehydrated. The survival mantra goes: You can survive 3 minutes without air, 3 days without water and 3 weeks without food, so finding something to drink is these women’s number one priority.

programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.sub-title: The Island with Bear Grylls - The Men: Episode 4
programme.desc: In the ultimate survival experiment, Bear Grylls has abandoned 14 British men on a remote desert island in the Pacific with just the clothes they stand up in and a few basic tools. This time the survival challenge is harder than ever, as they attempt to survive entirely on their own wits for six weeks in the height of the tropical storm season. It’s four days since then men trapped and killed a crocodile, and they haven’t been able to repeat their success. Most of the meager meals they are eating are coming from cleaning facilities manager, Vic, who has is the only member of the group to mastered his improvised fishing rod.

programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.sub-title: The Island with Bear Grylls - The Women: Episode 4
programme.desc: In the ultimate survival experiment, Bear Grylls has abandoned 14 British women on a remote desert island in the Pacific with just the clothes they stand up in and a few basic tools. This time the survival challenge is harder than before, as they attempt to survive entirely on their own wits for six weeks in the height of the tropical storm season. The extreme conditions on the island are taking their toll on the 11 remaining women and they are now on the brink of starvation. They are living on an extreme low calorie diet, surviving on snails and limpets and scraps of scavenged yucca and coconut.

programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.sub-title: The Island with Bear Grylls - The Women: Episode 5
programme.desc: In the ultimate survival experiment, Bear Grylls has abandoned 14 British women on a remote desert island in the Pacific with just the clothes they stand up in and a few basic tools. As the group approaches the four week mark of the experiment, the 10 remaining women are entering dangerous medical territory. With very little research about how the body copes with extreme survival beyond this point, it’s more important than ever that they keep up their food and water supply otherwise they risk long term damage to their vital organs. Yesterday the women feasted on their first big kill – a large pig. 25 year old Nurse Lauren along with 30 year old potter Beth have stayed up all night to preserve the left-over pork, requisitioning one of the group’s two precious jerrycans – normally reserved for their water purification system.

programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.sub-title: The Island with Bear Grylls - The Men: Episode 5
programme.desc: In the ultimate survival experiment, Bear Grylls has abandoned 14 British men on a remote desert island in the Pacific with just the clothes they stand up in and a few basic tools. The survival challenge is harder than ever, as they attempt to survive entirely on their own wits for six weeks in the height of the tropical storm season. In this episode, the emergency evacuation team are called in when 36 year old, Will, falls off a cliff on to rocks, badly injuring himself.

programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.sub-title: The Island with Bear Grylls - The Women: Episode 6
programme.desc: In the ultimate survival experiment, Bear Grylls has abandoned 14 British women on a remote desert island in the Pacific with just the clothes they stand up in and a few basic tools. The survival challenge is harder than ever, as they attempt to live entirely on their own wits for six weeks in the height of the tropical storm season. The women are starving as they enter their sixth and final week on The Island. Having plundered all the resources in the vicinity of their beach, the group are now looking to the ocean to sustain them. The women are pinning all their hopes on their fishing net catching a major haul but so far it’s eluded them.

programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.sub-title: The Island with Bear Grylls - The Men: Episode 6
programme.desc: In this final episode, after five weeks on the island, the men are struggling to find enough to eat as the island's already depleted resources fail to deliver the coconuts and limpets that have become their staple diet. With energy levels at rock bottom, the island's oldest castaway - 58-year-old car salesman Phil - is forgotten when an unsatisfying watery fish broth is served for lunch.

programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.sub-title: The Island with Bear Grylls - Surviving The Island
programme.desc: In this special episode of The Island With Bear Grylls takes an in-depth look at life on the islands. On The Island, Bear conducted the ultimate survival challenge to see if 14 men and 14 women could survive for six weeks on an uninhabited island in the Pacific Ocean. They were completely alone, filming everything themselves, with only a handful of basic tools and the clothes they stood up in. They not only had to survive entirely on their own wits for six gruelling weeks, but had to contend with the vicious tropical storm season.

programme.title: Travel Guides: New Zealand
programme.desc: Meet the five families chosen to be New Zealand’s Travel Guides as they take on their first adventure in Northland. But there’s a few unhappy campers when the sleeping arrangements are revealed.

programme.title: Travel Guides: New Zealand
programme.desc: Our Travel Guides explore the dramatic scenery and wild coastline of Southland in an adventure that takes them to Invercargill, Bluff and Stewart Island.

programme.title: Travel Guides: New Zealand
programme.desc: The Travel Guides head to the East Coast for a classic Kiwi road trip but how will the families fare in the cramped conditions of their campervans?

programme.title: Travel Guides: New Zealand
programme.desc: The Travel Guides enjoy a luxury escape at a five star resort in Marlborough’s Bay of Many Coves.

programme.title: Travel Guides: New Zealand
programme.desc: Our Travel Guides explore the untouched beauty of Fiordland in an adventure that takes them to Te Anau, Lake Manapouri and Doubtful Sound.

programme.title: Travel Guides: New Zealand
programme.desc: The Travel Guides explore New Zealand’s largest city in a final adventure to Auckland, the city of sails.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard goes to Vienna with comedian Chris O'Dowd to sample the sausages, cakes, wines and spirits. The pair also take a hot-rod tour, visit a fairground, the Freud museum and the city sewers.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and Mel Giedroyc do a Paris le weekend, with snails, absinthe, a cordon bleu cookery course, bespoke perfume and an art tour.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Comedian Noel Fielding joins Richard for 48 fast and funny hours in the Danish capital, with cycling, sightseeing, art, sandwiches, beer and rollercoasters.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard and Greg Davies attempt to extract the essence of Moscow in two days, as they clash with army tanks, head into space and visit one of the strangest circuses in the world.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade heads to southern Spain with comedian Rob Delaney from Catastrophe, where they eat tapas, learn to dance flamenco and go a bit Wild West.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Hollywood actor Paul Rudd joins Richard to discover Finland's seaside capital, with a time-efficient exploration by kayak, a good steaming in the city's saunas and salty sweets.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Hollywood actor Rebel Wilson joins Richard for a fun-packed whizz round Florence in a mini-break mixing art, action, gelato, a drive in a classic Alfa Romeo, and some tripe.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Comedian Rob Beckett joins Richard Ayoade in Russia's cultural capital, for a post-Soviet itinerary including an armoured tank, caviar, vodka, and a herring in a fur coat.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard and comedian Aisling Bea make a whirlwind tour of Hungary's fairy-tale capital, with selfies, goulash, cake, pubs, liquor, and a game of chess at the thermal baths.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade packs his case and heads to the Canaries to discover what lies beyond the all-inclusive resorts of the volcanic island of Tenerife. Making the trip from LA to join him is writer, director and actor, Lena Dunham.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.sub-title: Travel Man - Rome with Matt Lucas
programme.desc: Richard is joined by Matt Lucas, actor, comedian and many other things besides, for a frenetic 48 hours in the eternal city, Rome. Over a packed duo of days they cram in culture, cuisine, history, hats and as many sights as they can see.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.sub-title: Travel Man - Amsterdam with Joe Lycett
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and comedian Joe Lycett head to the mini break mecca of Amsterdam for a 48 hour hurtle through the city's attractions. In just two days the pair power through culture, cardio, canals, cuisine and much more, not all of it beginning with a 'c'.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.sub-title: Travel Man - Christmas Special: Hong Kong with Jon Hamm
programme.desc: In an hour-long Christmas extravaganza, Richard and Mad Men actor Jon Hamm tour Hong Kong, taking in a tai chi drop-in session, a ride in a chopper and some fusion dim sum.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.sub-title: Travel Man - Oslo with Fay Ripley
programme.desc: Richard is joined by actor Fay Ripley for a wintry mini-break in Oslo. Together they pack two days with sledging, screaming, skiing, sculpture and scoff.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade delivers the definitive guide to a 48 hours mini-break in Switzerland's largest city, Zurich. Joining him for fondue, hot chocolate, Dada, footie, and a ride on the steepest funicular railway in the world is Frank Skinner.

programme.title: Travel Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and comic actor Jessica Knappett tour the White Isle of the Med where they spend 48 hours. They take in some alfresco art, deluxe cocktails, an exclusive supper club and a hippy gong bath.
